alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phillips and northern Petroleum Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 16 miles southwest of Hays, or 17 miles southwest of Zortman. These storms are nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zortman, Landusky and Fred Robinson Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
